Here I did some exploratory analysis on the EU funds and what percentage of them has been disbursed in Italy for the 2014-2020 funding cycle. Incidentally, I learned to use a fun R package **`reactable`** (based on the `React Table` JavaScript library).

Below links to:

-   Analysis: `r distilltools::icon_link("open-data", "Rpubs file", "https://rpubs.com/Lulliter/ERDF")` & Code: `r distilltools::icon_link("github", "Github repo", "https://github.com/Lulliter/plan2implem")`
